Uses of Interface
org.drasyl.handler.discovery.PathEvent

Packages that use PathEvent
Package
Description
org.drasyl.handler.discovery
Different methods to discover peers.

  • Uses of PathEvent in org.drasyl.handler.discovery

    Classes in org.drasyl.handler.discovery that implement PathEvent
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AddPathAndChildrenEvent
    Signals that a direct routing path has been discovered to getAddress() and that this peer is registered at us as a children.
    class 
    AddPathAndSuperPeerEvent
    Signals that a direct routing path has been discovered to getAddress() and that we are registered as a children as this peer.
    class 
    AddPathEvent
    Signals that a direct routing path has been discovered to getAddress().
    class 
    RemoveChildrenAndPathEvent
    Signals that getAddress() is no longer registered at us as a children because the direct routing path to that peer is no longer available.
    class 
    RemovePathEvent
    Signals that a direct routing path to getAddress() is no longer available.
    class 
    RemoveSuperPeerAndPathEvent
    Signals that we are no longer registered at as a children at getAddress() as the direct routing path to that peer is no longer available.
